printer_text:
Confidential.
For the attention of the executive committee.
I am aware of the initial impact that the announcement of the social plan will have on morale, but there is nothing better than a shock to motivate employees. Therefore, for streamlining the organisation, I propose to provide you with a list of a few employees who, in my view, are dispensable in my department.
I specifically identify three:
my secretary Isabelle P., the graphic designer Thierry A., and the person responsible for our online presence, Albert F.
This will allow the remaining 80% to seize the opportunity and stop bothering us with remote work. Thank you, in any case, for waiting until I return from my holiday before making any public announcements, as the unions are likely to wake up.
Sincerely,
Mr. Dufront, Marketing Director
postit_text:
Isabelle,
I didn`t have time
to give you the
code.
It`s 1234.
 
 Jean. XXXO
book_text:
Door code for office 641A:
1634

At least you`ll be able to use
the fridge.
Just make sure not to
touch anything.

Jules
love_letter:
You had told me that
we would go
on holiday together.

You`re nothing but a coward.
You had said you would leave your wife.
I`m tired of your lies.

Isa
blackmail_text: Jules. I don`t give a damn that our security policy prevents us from running everything we want at the IT level. Specifically, I hereby order you to open ports 445 and 3389 of our firewall to allow my team to do their job. You have been warned. If you don`t do it, it will go up to the board of directors. I have enough skeletons in the closet to get you and your team of incompetent fools fired.

PEDAGOGICAL MODE
ACTIVATED

to find information security advice.
pedago_object01:
DATA LEAK
Risk: Loss of document confidentiality due to an oversight on a shared printer
Remediation: Access control on printer and staff training
pedago_object02:
DATA LEAK and SECURITY BREACH
Risk: Public display of a password
Remediation: Staff training
pedago_object03:
SECURITY BREACH
Risk: Unsecured password

Remediation: Force complex passwords and staff training
pedago_object04:
SECURITY BREACH
Risk: Personnal computer unlocked with security updates not done
Remediation: Force computer lock after idle time and security updates

Risk: USB Stick left unattended
Remediation: Staff training
pedago_object06:

pedago_object10:
DATA LEAK and SECURITY BREACH
Risk: BYOD - Bring your own disaster (unsecured personnal communication equipment)
Remediation: Ban use of personnal material for work purposes and staff training
pedago_object11:
SECURITY BREACK
Risk: Disrespect of security policies
Remediation: Staff training
